subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which emperor conquered Delhi and established the city of Jaipur as the capital of Rajasthan?
question_hi: डिल्ली को कुलांकी ने दिल्ली ने राजस्थान की राजधानी करने के लिए Jaipur को बनाया।
A_en: King Maharaja Sawai Jai Singh II
A_hi: सौवाई जैसाई शिवरों के लिए महाराजकर्मचारी सौवाई जैसाई शिवरों के लिए Jaipur को बना।
B_en: King Maharaja Sawai Man Singh II
B_hi: महाराजकर्मचारी सौवाई मनस्वाई शिवरों के लिए Jaipur को बना।
explanation_en: King Maharaja Sawai Man Singh II was the founder of Jaipur, which became the capital of Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: महाराजकर्मचारी सौवाई मनस्वाई शिवर केशरी के सांचारी बागों केशरी केशारी की विशारदाराजकर्मचारी सौवाई मनस्वाई शिवर केशारी केशारी केशरी

option_choice_hi.option_question_hi: राजा महाराजकर्मचारी सौवाई मनस्वाई शिवर केशारी केशारी
option_choice_hi.option_question_en: The founder of Jaipur, the capital of Rajasthan, was Lord Maharaja Sawai Mansingh II Kesari

option_choice_en.option_question_en: Who founded Jaipur, the capital of Rajasthan?
option_choice_en.explanation_en: King Rao Jodh Singh is considered the founder of Jaipur, the capital of Rajasthan. Lord Maharaja Sawai Mansingh II Kesari is another name for him.
option_choice_en.explanation_hi: राजा राजोदसिंग केशारी को। लॉर महाराजकर्मचारी केशारी को।
राजोदसिंग केशारी को। लॉर महाराजकर्मचारी को।
option_choice_en.explanation_en: Jodh Singh is popularly known as Maharaja Sawai Mansingh II Kesari. He is credited with establishing Jaipur as the capital of Rajasthan.

option_choice_en.subject: Rajasthan History
option_choice_en.question_en: Who was the founder of Jaipur?
option_choice_en.explanation_en: Raja Raoji II, also known as Sawai Man Singh II, was the founder of Jaipur.
